title: THE IMPOSSIBLE FORTUNE
author: Richard Osman
description: The fifth book in the Thursday Murder Club series. The gang look into the disappearance of a guest Elizabeth met at a wedding.

title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
author: Dan Brown
description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.

title: ALCHEMISED
author: SenLinYu
description: After the war, an imprisoned alchemist is sent to a necromancer to recover her lost memories.

title: FOURTH WING
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

title: VINCE FLYNN: DENIED ACCESS
author: Don Bentley
description: The 24th book in the Mitch Rapp series. Rapp, now an assassin in the Orion program, must counter threats to his girlfriend and the C.I.A.

title: 107 DAYS
author: Kamala Harris
description: The former vice president recounts her abbreviated campaign to become president in 2024.

title: POEMS & PRAYERS
author: Matthew McConaughey
description: The actor and author of “Greenlights” explores elements of belief and reason that make up our lives.

title: TRULY
author: Lionel Richie
description: The multiple award-winning musician shares moments from his early years, his time with the Commodores and other professional highlights.

title: BORN LUCKY
author: Leland Vittert with Don Yaeger
description: The NewsNation host describes how his father helped him navigate living with autism.

title: CONFRONTING EVIL
author: Bill O'Reilly and Josh Hammer
description: O'Reilly and Hammer profile some of history’s nefarious characters.

title: HOW TO MAKE MONEY IN ANY MARKET
author: Jim Cramer

title: THE COURT OF THE DEAD
author: Rick Riordan and Mark Oshiro
description: Nico, Will and Hazel delve into the mysterious disappearances of monsters at Camp Jupiter. (Ages 10 to 14)

title: SECRETS OF THE PURPLE PEARL
author: Kate McKinnon
description: Millicent and the gang are in a race to find the Purple Pearl before the Krenetics Research Association can get their hands on it. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: SWEET & SALTY!
author: King Arthur Baking Company
description: A collection of over 80 sweet and salty recipes for young bakers. (Ages 8 and up)

title: THE POISONED KING
author: Katherine Rundell. Illustrated Ashley Mackenzie
description: Christopher and Anya must save the dragons of the Archipelago from a strange new threat. (Ages 10 and up)

title: TROUBLING TONSILS!
author: Aaron Reynolds. Illustrated Peter Brown
description: Charlie Marmot's infected tonsils have disappeared before surgery! (Ages 6 to 9)

title: THE LEAF THIEF
author: Alice Hemming. Illustrated Nicola Slater
description: Squirrel attempts to figure out who has stolen his leaves. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: HOW TO CATCH A WITCH
author: Alice Walstead. Illustrated Megan Joyce
description: The Catch Club Kids attempt to snare a witch on Halloween. (Ages 4 to 7)

title: HOW TO CATCH A MONSTER
author: Adam Wallace. Illustrated Andy Elkerton
description: A boy attempts to catch the monster in his closet. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: IF I BUILT A TOWN
author: Chris Van Dusen
description: Jack uses his vivid imagination to plan his own town. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: CHICKA CHICKA TRICKA TREAT
author: Julien Chung
description: The alphabet letters climb the creaky old tree for Halloween. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE TWILIGHT SAGA
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: Vampires and werewolves and their intrigues in high school. (Ages 12 and up)

title: LIGHTLARK SAGA
author: Alex Aster
description: Every 100 years the island of Lightlark appears and a deadly competition called the Centennial takes place. (Ages 13 and up)

title: THE HUNGER GAMES
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopia, a girl fights for survival on live TV. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THE SUMMER I TURNED PRETTY TRILOGY
author: Jenny Han
description: A beach house, summer love and enduring friendships. (Ages 12 and up)

title: DIARY OF A WIMPY KID
author: Jeff Kinney. Illustrated Jeff Kinney
description: The travails and challenges of adolescence. (Ages 9 to 12)

title: FAKE SKATING
author: Lynn Painter
description: After years of separation, the childhood friends Alec and Dani reunite and face their true feelings toward each other. (Ages 14 and up)

title: BITTEN
author: Jordan Stephanie Gray
description: Vanessa seeks vengeance against the werewolves who attacked her and changed her life forever. (Ages 14 to 18)

title: HOUR OF THE PUMPKIN QUEEN
author: Megan Shepherd
description: After a potion demonstration goes awry, Sally and Luna fall through a portal to Time Town. (Ages 12 and up)

title: YOU'VE FOUND OLIVER
author: Dustin Thao
description: In this companion to “You’ve Reached Sam” Oliver accidentally hits the call button, but someone else picks up. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THORN SEASON
author: Kiera Azar
description: In the Kingdom of Daradon, where wielding magic is treason, Alissa Paine must conceal her magical abilities or face persecution. (Ages 14 and up)
